item.description:
First Meeting will consist of something like a "speed dating" format. Thought we could meet each other for, say, 15 minute intervals and then switch. Pretty much a meet and greet night.

After that, who knows the possibilites! We can have Spanish game night, go to restaurants, Spanish speaking movies, share vacation stories, new lessons, etc.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a sign on the tables "Spanish Language Meetup"

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup
